<a id="ScrollBar"></a>

# ScrollBar

**Inherits:** [Range](Range.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [HScrollBar](HScrollBar.md), [VScrollBar](VScrollBar.md)

Abstract base class for scrollbars.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Abstract base class for scrollbars, typically used to navigate through content that extends beyond the visible area of a control. Scrollbars are [Range](Range.md)-based controls.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Signals

<a id="ScrollBar_signal_scrolling"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**scrolling**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#ScrollBar_signal_scrolling)

Emitted when the scrollbar is being scrolled.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="ScrollBar_property_custom_step"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **custom_step** = `-1.0` [ðŸ”—](#ScrollBar_property_custom_step)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_custom_step**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_custom_step**\ (\ )

Overrides the step used when clicking increment and decrement buttons or when using arrow keys when the **ScrollBar** is focused.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Theme Property Descriptions

<a id="ScrollBar_theme_icon_decrement"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **decrement** [ðŸ”—](#ScrollBar_theme_icon_decrement)

Icon used as a button to scroll the **ScrollBar** left/up. Supports custom step using the [custom_step](ScrollBar.md#ScrollBar_property_custom_step) property.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ScrollBar_theme_icon_decrement_highlight"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **decrement_highlight** [ðŸ”—](#ScrollBar_theme_icon_decrement_highlight)

Displayed when the mouse cursor hovers over the decrement button.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ScrollBar_theme_icon_decrement_pressed"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **decrement_pressed** [ðŸ”—](#ScrollBar_theme_icon_decrement_pressed)

Displayed when the decrement button is being pressed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ScrollBar_theme_icon_increment"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **increment** [ðŸ”—](#ScrollBar_theme_icon_increment)

Icon used as a button to scroll the **ScrollBar** right/down. Supports custom step using the [custom_step](ScrollBar.md#ScrollBar_property_custom_step) property.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ScrollBar_theme_icon_increment_highlight"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **increment_highlight** [ðŸ”—](#ScrollBar_theme_icon_increment_highlight)

Displayed when the mouse cursor hovers over the increment button.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ScrollBar_theme_icon_increment_pressed"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **increment_pressed** [ðŸ”—](#ScrollBar_theme_icon_increment_pressed)

Displayed when the increment button is being pressed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ScrollBar_theme_style_grabber"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **grabber** [ðŸ”—](#ScrollBar_theme_style_grabber)

Used as texture for the grabber, the draggable element representing current scroll.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ScrollBar_theme_style_grabber_highlight"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **grabber_highlight** [ðŸ”—](#ScrollBar_theme_style_grabber_highlight)

Used when the mouse hovers over the grabber.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ScrollBar_theme_style_grabber_pressed"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **grabber_pressed** [ðŸ”—](#ScrollBar_theme_style_grabber_pressed)

Used when the grabber is being dragged.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ScrollBar_theme_style_scroll"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **scroll** [ðŸ”—](#ScrollBar_theme_style_scroll)

Used as background of this **ScrollBar**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ScrollBar_theme_style_scroll_focus"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **scroll_focus** [ðŸ”—](#ScrollBar_theme_style_scroll_focus)

Used as background when the **ScrollBar** has the GUI focus.
